name: @sentry/utils
description: Utilities for all Sentry JavaScript SDKs
author: Sentry

scripts.build:es5: yarn build:cjs # *** backwards compatibility - remove in v7 ***
scripts.build:rollup: yarn rollup -c rollup.npm.config.js && cp ../dev-utils/src/jsPolyfills/README.md build/jsPolyfills && cp -r build/jsPolyfills . && echo "**Dummy copy of polyfills (copied from \`build/jsPolyfills\`) necessary for tests.**" > jsPolyfills/why-is-this-here?.md
scripts.build:rollup:polyfills: yarn rollup -c rollup.polyfills.config.js && cp ../../rollup/jsPolyfills/README.md jsPolyfills && yarn tsc --allowJs --skipLibCheck --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly ../../rollup/jsPolyfills/index.js && yarn tsc --allowJs --skipLibCheck --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly ../../rollup/jsPolyfills/originals.js
scripts.build:es5:watch: yarn build:cjs:watch # *** backwards compatibility - remove in v7 ***
